mapper.select: SELECT project_id , member_id , title , start_date , end_date FROM project WHERE member_id = #{ memberId } AND #{ date } BETWEEN start_date AND end_date ORDER BY created_at

SELECT a.task_id , a.project_id , a.member_id , a.content , a.is_checked , a.date FROM task a JOIN project b ON a.project_id = b.project_id WHERE a.member_id = #{ memberId } AND a.date = #{ date } AND a.project_id = #{ projectId } AND a.project_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.created_at
